name: Hyperspace Cowboy
description:
Burn through hyperspace and wreck havoc on the legions of bounty hunters who came to hunt you down!

Controls

WASD or Directional arrows to move
Space to shoot missiles

Attributions

Rocket by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4304-rocket
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Wireframe shader by Chaser324  (on the Windows version)
Link : https://github.com/Chaser324/unity-wireframe
License : MIT

The screenshots are from the Windows version, where the wireframe shaders actually work.
